<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Collar of Inconspicuousness](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3016)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Companion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=558" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=637" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=676" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 272 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 475 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn collar

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This leather collar's almost threadbare look belies its magical nature. When your companion wears and invests the collar, it gains the ability to change its appearance from that of a ferocious animal into a more inconspicuous form. 

**Activate—Adorable Guise** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))    **Effect** You touch your animal companion to transform it into a nonthreatening Tiny creature of the same family or a similar creature (for instance, a house cat instead of a tiger, or a puppy instead of a wolf). This has the effects of [_pest form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=217) (2nd rank, or 4th rank if your companion can fly). The effect lasts until you Dismiss it.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
